data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ojanguren-Affilastro, Andrés Alejandro, Garcia-Mauro, Ignacio (2010): A new Bothriurus (Scorpiones, Bothriuridae) from the Somuncura Plateau, with additions to the knowledge to the endemic scorpion fauna of the area. Zootaxa 2488: 52-64, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.195560
